segments.text: I notice the angled view of this kitchen, showing the sink and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is drying a plate, her expression calm and neutral.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unbeknownst to her, water is flooding from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's streaming down the cabinet doors, pooling on the tiles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is wet, but she keeps working away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are behind her, up to no good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs the tilting stool toward the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand in the jar, the other holding a plate awkwardly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands ready, arm extended expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look thrilled about their secret snack.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool's instability worries me greatly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And with the slippery floor, it's double trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful in comparison.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one has noticed yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is full of hidden dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR
